document_data.name: Northfurrow's End
document_data.mainbody: '''Northfurrow's End''' was an inn located in the walled, [[Chauntea]]n farming community of [[Goldenfields]]. As of the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], it was run by the [[Emerald Enclave]] sympathizer, [[Miros Xelbrin]].
document_data.Location: Northfurrow's End was located near the center of Goldenfields, at a spot that overlooked its vast vegetable gardens.
document_data.Structure:
The inn was constructed from stone and stood three stories tall.

On either side of its front doors were two life-size statues of [[horse]]s standing on their hind legs.
document_data.Services:
Northfurrow's End provided travelers with roomy accommodations and delicious dishes made from fresh, locally grown ingredients.

The inn offered its patrons a locally brewed beer known as [[Goldengulp]]. They were served in painted clay flagons that were crafted by the inn's proprietor.
